channel.description: Recent content in drawing on Ramblings of a cloud engineer

item.title: Note taking what when how often
item.description:
Hello Everybody.

Today I would like to tell you about a little conversation I had with my friend Adrian.

The topic was about how, when and what to log during a testing session regarding a story.

So let’s see what came out of that talk…

item.title: What my brain is up to the whole day…
item.description: Hello folks. Here is a little graphic I made to show what my brain is up to the whole day long… Excuse me for the lack of my colouring skills… Enjoy Thanks for reading! Gergely.

item.title: Learning programming with a visual mind
item.description: Hi folks. Today I want to write to you about learning something with a visual mind. There are a gazillion posts out there that tell you how to learn something with a visual mind. However, there are only a few actually describing how to learn something as complicated and logical as programming. How do you draw up a function? How do you draw up a cycle or a structure? Actually these are really easy.

item.title: Learning programming with a visual mind
item.description: Hi folks. Today I want to write to you about learning something with a visual mind. There are a gazillion posts out there that tell you how to learn something with a visual mind. However, there are only a few actually describing how to learn something as complicated and logical as programming. How do you draw up a function? How do you draw up a cycle or a structure? Actually these are really easy.
